Description.Text:
Position Apostoli Palace is located in a quiet, characteristic neighborhood in the very heart of historic Venice with easy access to both the city's major sights, Saint Mark's Square and the Rialto Bridge, and the public transportation system.
Restaurant
Outside The structure dates to the mid-fifteenth century and was completely restored in 2002 to ensure maximum comfort and a high standard of quality.
Lobby
More Informations The hotel is also conveniently located for opera and symphonic performances at the Malibran Theater.
